reviews.text: Draft. Copper color, delicate white foam. Aroma: malt, fruit, nectar or honey, raisins. Taste: malt-wine, honeydew, grapes and fruit, pleasant medium bitterness, a little pine.

Bottle. Bronze color, good foam. Aroma: vanilla, oak, barrels, toffee, caramel, fortified wine, a little bourbon. Taste: oak, vanilla, bourbon, toffee, very warming, oily, medium hop bitterness, good balanced.

On tap. Hazy deep brown, moderate creamy beige head. Well-lacing. Aroma: caramel & roasted malts, citrusy hops. Medium body. Rich malty taste. Roast, caramel, coffee, dried fruit. Light citrus hop bitterness. Good-- rated with beerbasher/winphone
